dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1736 IH: To amend the Clean Air Act with respect to the ethanol waiver for the Reid vapor pressure limitations under such Act.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Smith of Nebraska (for himself, Mr. Buck, Mr. Rodney Davis of Illinois, and Mrs. Noem) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Clean Air Act with respect to the ethanol waiver for the Reid vapor pressure limitations under such Act.

section.text: Section 211(h)(4) of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7545(h)(4)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by inserting or more after 10 percent; and
in subparagraph (C), by striking additional alcohol or.
